thread.title: Manchester United legend Patrice Evra reveals he almost rejoined the club in January… but his move was blocked by a senior figure

author: dfraser
title: Manchester United legend Patrice Evra reveals he almost rejoined the club in January… but his move was blocked by a senior figure
text:
EFL Pat's mad Manchester United legend Patrice Evra reveals he almost rejoined the club in January… but his move was blocked by a senior figure 
Marseille full-back was on the brink of a sentimental move back to Old Trafford, only to have his switch scuppered By Dave Fraser
